intro.title: Who Am I
intro.description: With over 10 years of professional experience, specialize in crafting websites using Vue.js, have experience in creating custom WordPress themes and utilizing web builder platforms like Wix or Webflow.

data.title: Microsite for digital campaign
data.description: Develop websites for short-term marketing goals, such as campaigns, product launches, events, and promotions.

data.title: WordPress theme development
data.description: Develop custom themes for WordPress, suitable for company profiles, blogs, educational platforms, and news websites.

data.title: Development from web builder
data.description: Help you create a website using a web builder. This service is ideal for small businesses and nonprofit websites.

data.title: Web application development
data.description: Develop web tools and services based on your needs, suitable for online shops or content management.

flow.title: How I Work
flow.intro: In general here is the development workflow

data.title: Getting brief from client
data.description: Clients share project details and requirements.

data.title: Task Breakdown
data.description: The project is divided into clear tasks and features.

data.title: Start Development (Phase 1)
data.description: Tasks are assigned into sprints and executed based on priorities.

data.title: Minimum Viable Product (MVP)
data.description: An MVP is created, focusing on essential features.

data.title: Start Development (Phase 2)
data.description: Doing improvements based on client feedback.

data.title: User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
data.description: The product is tested internally and by the client.

data.title: Deployed to Production
data.description: Once the client approves, the website is deployed to production.

hire.description: Tell me about your project by filling out my Project Inquiry Form
